void_function_no_parameters.name: Method that does not return a value and takes no parameters

void_function_with_parameters.name: Method that does not return a value and that takes 1 or more defined parameters

void_function_variable_parameters.name: Method that does not return a value and takes a variable number of parameters

return_value_function_no_parameters.name: Method that returns a value and takes no parameters

return_value_function_with_parameters.name: Method that returns a value and takes 1 or more defined parameters

return_value_function_variable_parameter.name: Method that returns a value and takes a variable number of parameters

anonymous_function_no_parameters.name: Anonymous function that takes no parameters

anonymous_function_with_parameters.name: Anonymous function that takes 1 or more defined parameters

return_from_subroutine.name: Return from subroutine
return_from_subroutine.code:
MyClass x = new MyClass();
subRoutineReturnType y = x.subRoutine();
